r.s: DB drivers for LDAP v2 and v3 database
r.d: DB_ldap2 and DB_ldap3 classes extend DB_common to provide DB compliant access to LDAP servers with protocol version 2 and 3. The drivers provide common DB interface as much as possible and support prepare/execute statements.
r.n:
Bugs fixed:
- Remapping error codes from native to PEAR DB.
Also:
- Tests and examples added to the package.
